forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the early morning unfolds beneath a gentle embrace of sunlight, infusing the day with a warm optimism. The skies above are predominantly clear, painting a soft canvas of blue that hints at the day’s promise of a high around 66 degrees. While the air retains a coolness—stemming from the west-southwest breezes that dance with a playful gust—there's a certain clarity that invites you outdoors. As the day progresses, temperatures will gracefully retreat to a mild 64, offering a pleasant respite from the morning chill.

As the sun dips lower later tonight, a shift will occur. The clouds will gradually weave themselves into the fabric of the sky, bringing a moderate haze that carries the earthy freshness typical of the Bay Area. With nighttime temperatures settling around 58, a light jacket will be a wise companion for evening strolls or perhaps a leisurely coffee chat at a sidewalk café. The absence of fog this morning suggests clear visibility, a perfect time for a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a relaxed visit to one of the local parks. Take a moment to pause and relish the delightful juxtaposition of nature and urban life before the clouds take over, letting the gentle breeze remind you of the tranquility that can often be overlooked in the bustle of the city.
